Description:
PN/JS/101121/JP/01 - 312028500
That you have failed to conduct your undertaking in such a way as to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, that persons (not being your employees) who may be affected thereby are not exposed to risks to their health or safety, in particular that you have carried out gas installation work when you were not at that time nor are you currently a member of a class of persons approved by HSE to carry out work on gas fittings or gas service pipework. This installation was in such poor condition that it presented a significant risk to those within the property and that the said matters involve contravention of the following statutory provisions because you are not a member of a class of persons approved for the time being by the Health and Safety Executive for the purposes of carrying out work on a gas fitting or gas service pipework, in particular that the relevant registration is held with "Gas Safe Register".
